alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Lowndes; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 6:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cook, south central Berrien, western Lowndes, northern Brooks, Colquitt and southeastern Worth Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 658 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Doerun to I-75 At Exit 16. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Adel, Valdosta, Hahira, Sparks, Norman Park, Doerun, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Riverside, Schley, Remerton, Morven, Berlin, Funston, Cecil, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, Minton and Barretts. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Lowndes; Worth
